item.title: Requirements
item.description: Minimun requirements: Untested Recommended specs: TBD Tested devices: CPU: Ryzen 5600 GPU: RTX 3060ti RAM: 32GB CPU: 6500 GPU: rtx 3050 FPS: Smooth CPU: i5 6600 GPU: gtx 960 RAM: 16GB FPS: GPU 성능 부족 CPU: i5 4590 GPU: intel HD graphics 4600 RAM: 8GB FPS: Unplayable

item.title: Installation
item.description: You can download the zip files on https://dl.whatthesamuel.com(Important! The email security code is a Cloudflare feature. I don’t collect any data). File names: Windows_debug_game.zip : game compiled with ‘debug’ setting in unreal. Steam login Windows_debug_game_accportal.zip : game compiled with ‘debug’ setting in unreal. Epic login Windows_development.zip : game compiled with ‘development’ setting in unreal. Steam login Windows_development_accportal.zip : game compiled with ‘development’ setting in unreal. Epic login Extract the contents Locate the executable Play Optional Report any bugs / Request features

item.title: Configuration
item.description: Go to ‘Options’ in the main menu and change the settings as you like.
